$interpreted: Unknown Thing: Oollaa... Oooolll... Dora!?
Unknown Thing: Do... Dora!?
Sharice: Did you see that, birdbrain?
Puggi: Clear as day.
Sharice: I think we should get out of here...
Unknown Thing: Dora! Ra! Doraaaaaa!
Unknown Thing: Dora! Dora! Dora!
Sharice: They look mad... you think it's cause we're here?
Sharice: We might have to fight our way out of here.
Sharice: Birdbrain, when we fight you better have my back.
Puggi: Fight? Whaddaya mean fight? I can't!
Sharice: What? You...!
Unknown Thing: Dora~~~
Unknown Thing: Oolaa... Oooolaaaa~~~
Sharice: Did I just go that hard on you guys? You...
Puggi: Sharice, you shouldn't bully the weak like that! Listen, they're all saying how scary and mean you are!
Sharice: I'm not bullying anybody... wait, what did you just say!?
Sharice: You can understand them!?
Puggi: Sure, same as I can understand you. What... you can't?
Puggi: Heh, I mean, of course I can understand 'em! I'm the main character!
Sharice: ...All I hear is "dora dora" whatever...
Sharice: So when we were outside of the cave, you heard them crying? Why were they crying?
Sharice: What's going on here?
Unknown Thing: Oooo? Doraa?
Sharice: There's so many of them!
Sharice: Why does this feel strangely familiar?
Puggi: Oooh! That familiar curvature! That golden hue! A wonderful buttery smell...
Puggi: Could it be... are you my children!?
Puggi: Kids!! Daddy's back!!
Unknown Thing: Olala~ Oorara?
Sharice: Eh? What's wrong?
Puggi: They said they're called "mandora", and this is their kindgom.
Sharice: Mandora? I've... never heard of 'em.
Sharice: And they have a kingdom?
Horned Mandora: Odora~ Doraaaa?
Puggi: They also want to know you name~ And... your favorite food, and weather, and vacation spot, and your bust size...
Sharice: My bust size!? Dammit birdbrain, you added that in there!
Puggi: I swear! They asked!

Sharice: My name is Sharice Carterwell!
And I swear if you ask for my bust size again... just tell me what they're really saying!
Sharice: (I can't believe he can really communicate with them...)
Sharice: If you look at them, there seem to be a bunch of different types of these things... these 'mandora'.
Sharice: Some can fly, some seem a bit stronger...
Sharice: ...These ones seem a little derpy.
Sharice: They look the same, but also quite... different.
Mandora Guard: Dorararadora—
Sharice: Are you alright?
Mandora: Doraaaa...
Puggi: The queen is coming!?
Sharice: Seems like someone important is here?
Queendora: Doradora? Dooooora?
Sharice: Uh... is she talking to us? I can't understand anything.
Puggi: Don't worry, I'll handle this.
Puggi: Greetings... ma'am? How do you do~~
Queendora: Ayaaa, what happened here!?
Queendora: Who are you two? You don't look like one of my citizens!!
Puggi: My name is Puggi, I'm the main character, and this shorty back here is Sharice. She's one of my fans~
Puggi: Are we in your kingdom?
Queendora: That's right. This is the illustrious Mandora Kingdom.
Sharice: We've invaded their kingdom! No wonder they attacked us...
Sharice: Hey birdbrain, tell them that we'll be on our wa—
Sharice: What the heck was that sound!?
Queendora: Agh! The monster! And it's angry again!!
Puggi: Monsters? You've got monsters here?
Queendora: Yes, and we're its favorite snack!
Queendora: My beloved, the king, has set out to single-handedly suppress the monster threat, and has yet to return!
Queendora: And the monster still growls and groans!! That must mean my husband is...
Queendora: He must have been eaten! And now... and now we'll all be eaten!
Mandora Guard: Dora~ Oooraa~ Ooooora~~~
Sharice: The king got eaten by a mandora-eating monster!?
Sharice: No wonder we could hear their cries from all the way outside...
Sharice: No what!?
Puggi: Is that monster comin' for us!?
Mandora Guard: Your Majesty! It's a hero! A hero is coming to save us!
Queendora: What!? You mean the hero of prophecy!?
Puggi: Hero? Prophecy? What is that? Can we eat it?

I think we should get out of here...
Dora! Ra! Doraaaaaa!

Fight? Whaddaya mean fight? I can't!
What? You...!
Dora~~~
Oolaa... Oooolaaaa~~~
Did I just go that hard on you guys? You...

That must mean my husband is...","sfxName":"e3489c3_story_007","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"fest_024_002_dialog_english##_32_001","SpeakerName":"Queendora","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/e3489c3","IconName":"e3489c3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"He must have been eaten!
